member.summary: Obtains a text representation of the selected cells, concatenating them with the and the .

member.returns: A text representation of the selected cells.

member.summary: Returns the data in the currently selected cells.
member.param: When this method returns, this array will contain the coordinates of the cells corresponding to the values in the return value.
member.returns: An array containing the data in the currently selected cells.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.Copy
member.summary: Copy the selected cells to the clipboard.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.Cut
member.summary: Cut the selected text out of the spreadsheed and into the clipboard.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.ClearContents
member.summary: Clear the contents of the selected cells.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.Paste(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Paste text or cells from the clipboard onto the spreadsheet. The text is parsed using the and the .
member.param: If this is , the contents of cells that are empty in the pasted text is removed; otherwise, empty cells in the text being pasted do not affect the spreadsheet.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.Paste(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Paste the specified text onto the spreadsheet. The text is parsed using the specified and .
member.param: The text to parse and paste.
If this is , the contents of cells that are empty in the pasted text is removed; otherwise, empty cells in the text being pasted do not affect the spreadsheet.
The row separator character. If this is , the current is used.
The column separator character. If this is , the current is used.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.Undo
member.summary: Undoes the last action performed on the spreadsheet.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.Redo
member.summary: Redoes the last undone action.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.InsertColumns
member.summary: Inserts a number of columns equal to the number of selected columns, just before the first selected column.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.DeleteColumns
member.summary: Deletes the selected columns.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.InsertRows
member.summary: Inserts a number of rows equal to the number of selected rows, just before the first selected rows.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.DeleteRows
member.summary: Deletes the selected rows.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.ResetFormat
member.summary: Resets the formatting of the selected cells/rows/columns.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.AutoFitWidth
member.summary: Automatically determines the width of the selected columns.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.AutoFitHeight
member.summary: Automatically determines the height of the selected rows.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.ResetWidth
member.summary: Resets the width of the selected columns to the default value.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.ResetHeight
member.summary: Resets the height of the selected columns to the default value.

member.summary: Sets the foreground colour of the current selection.

member.summary: Returns the typeface for the specified cell.

The vertical coordinate of the cell.

member.name: M:Spreadalonia.Spreadsheet.SplitData(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex,System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Splits the specified according to the and the , with the specified character.
member.param: The text to split.
The row separator (e.g., a newline character).
The column separator (e.g., a tabulation character).
The character(s) used to quote cells that contain separator characters within their value.
When this method returns, this value will contain the maximum width of the splitted text.
member.returns: The splitted text, as a jagged array. Each element of the array represents a row. Rows may have different lengths.
